title: Research-Based Online Education to Strengthen Core Competencies in Earth Science (MPG)

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge in earth science
context.additional_context: As adult citizens, learners acquire intermediate expertise in Earth system science (MPG) with an emphasis on practical knowledge applicable to solving local community issues.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze factors influencing geological environmental changes based on core concepts in mineralogy, petrology, and geochemistry.
Learners can understand the latest research trends in the MPG field and present examples of applying them to daily life.
Learners can complete knowledge-sharing and problem-solving projects among peers using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
